sn37.8:1.1: “Pañcahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
sn37.8:1.3: Assaddho ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappī ca hoti, maccharī ca hoti, duppañño ca hoti—
sn37.8:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo …pe…
